SELECT *, (SELECT member_nm FROM cms_member b WHERE a.member_idx = b.member_idx) member_nm, (SELECT category_nm FROM lms_edu_category f WHERE f.category_idx = a.category_idx ) eduCateNm, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM lms_edu_pack b WHERE b.edu_idx = a.edu_idx ) moduleCnt, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM lms_edu_detail b WHERE b.delete_yn = 'n' AND b.edu_idx = a.edu_idx) detailCnt FROM lms_edu a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lms_edu ( member_idx,edu_title,edu_category,category_idx,edu_type,edu_keyword,edu_module,edu_state, attachment_file_name, attachment_file_origin, insert_idx,insert_ip,insert_date ) VALUES ( #{memberIdx},#{eduTitle},#{eduCategory},#{categoryIdx},#{eduType},#{eduKeyword},#{eduModule},#{eduState}, #{attachmentFileName}, #{attachmentFileOrigin}, #{insertIdx},#{insertIp},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT a.regist_idx, a.detail_idx, a.team_idx, a.regist_state, a.regist_date, a.edu_state, a.edu_date, b.edu_numeral, b.edu_image1, b.edu_image2, b.edu_desc, b.edu_goal, b.edu_target, b.edu_criteria, b.edu_limit_cnt, b.edu_file1, b.edu_accept_bgn_date, b.edu_accept_bgn_time, b.edu_accept_end_date, b.edu_accept_end_time, b.edu_train_bgn_date, b.edu_train_end_date, b.detail_state, b.po_idx, c.edu_title, c.edu_keyword, c.edu_category, d.edu_pack_count, d.module_time_sum, b.ev_idx, cc.poqr_idx, cc.poqr_insert_date, dd.evqr_idx, dd.evqr_insert_date, b.train_title, ( SELECT member_nm FROM cms_member f WHERE f.member_idx = b.teacher_idx ) AS teacherNm, ( SELECT category_nm FROM lms_edu_category f WHERE f.category_idx = c.category_idx ) AS eduCateNm FROM lms_edu_regist a LEFT JOIN lms_edu_detail b ON a.detail_idx = b.detail_idx LEFT JOIN lms_edu c ON b.edu_idx = c.edu_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT edu_idx, COUNT(1) AS edu_pack_count, SUM(module_time) AS module_time_sum FROM lms_edu_pack aa LEFT JOIN lms_edu_module bb ON aa.module_idx = bb.module_idx GROUP BY edu_idx ) d ON b.edu_idx = d.edu_idx LEFT JOIN lms_poll_qson_review cc ON b.po_idx = cc.po_idx AND b.detail_idx = cc.detail_idx LEFT JOIN lms_evaluation_qson_review dd ON b.ev_idx = dd.ev_idx AND b.detail_idx = cc.detail_idx WHERE a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND a.delete_yn = 'n' GROUP BY regist_idx ORDER BY a.insert_date DESC

SELECT p.play_idx, b.detail_idx, b.edu_numeral, b.edu_image1, b.edu_image2, b.edu_desc, b.edu_goal, b.edu_target, b.edu_criteria, b.edu_limit_cnt, b.edu_file1, b.edu_accept_bgn_date, b.edu_accept_bgn_time, b.edu_accept_end_date, b.edu_accept_end_time, b.edu_train_bgn_date, b.edu_train_end_date, b.detail_state, b.po_idx, c.edu_title, c.edu_keyword, c.edu_category, d.edu_pack_count, d.module_time_sum, b.ev_idx, cc.poqr_idx, cc.poqr_insert_date, dd.evqr_idx, dd.evqr_insert_date, b.train_title, pp.po_play_idx, ep.ev_play_idx,
( SELECT member_nm FROM cms_member f WHERE f.member_idx = b.teacher_idx ) AS teacherNm, ( SELECT category_nm FROM lms_edu_category f WHERE f.category_idx = c.category_idx ) AS eduCateNm FROM lms_edu_play p LEFT JOIN lms_edu_detail b ON b.detail_idx = p.detail_idx LEFT JOIN lms_edu c ON b.edu_idx = c.edu_idx LEFT JOIN ( SELECT edu_idx, COUNT(1) AS edu_pack_count, SUM(module_time) AS module_time_sum FROM lms_edu_pack aa LEFT JOIN lms_edu_module bb ON aa.module_idx = bb.module_idx GROUP BY edu_idx ) d ON b.edu_idx = d.edu_idx LEFT JOIN lms_poll_qson_review cc ON b.po_idx = cc.po_idx AND b.detail_idx = cc.detail_idx LEFT JOIN lms_evaluation_qson_review dd ON b.ev_idx = dd.ev_idx AND b.detail_idx = cc.detail_idx LEFT JOIN lms_poll_play pp ON p.detail_idx = pp.detail_idx AND p.member_idx = pp.member_idx LEFT JOIN lms_evaluation_play ep ON p.detail_idx = ep.detail_idx AND p.member_idx = ep.member_idx
WHERE p.member_idx = #{memberIdx} GROUP BY p.play_idx ORDER BY p.play_idx DESC

select a.regist_idx, a.detail_idx, a.team, a.regist_state, a.regist_date, a.edu_state, a.edu_date, b.edu_numeral, b.edu_image1, b.edu_image2, b.edu_desc, b.edu_goal, b.edu_target, b.edu_criteria, b.edu_limit_cnt, b.edu_file1, b.edu_accept_bgn_date, b.edu_accept_bgn_time, b.edu_accept_end_date, b.edu_accept_end_time, b.edu_train_bgn_date, b.edu_train_end_date, b.detail_state, po_idx, c.edu_title, c.edu_keyword, c.edu_category, d.edu_pack_count, d.module_time_sum, b.train_title, (SELECT member_nm FROM cms_member f WHERE f.member_idx = b.teacher_idx ) teacherNm, (SELECT category_nm FROM lms_edu_category f WHERE f.category_idx = c.category_idx ) eduCateNm from lms_edu_regist a left join lms_edu_detail b on a.detail_idx = b.detail_idx left join lms_edu c on b.edu_idx = c.edu_idx left join (select edu_idx, count(1) edu_pack_count, sum(module_time) module_time_sum from lms_edu_pack aa left join lms_edu_module bb on aa.module_idx = bb.module_idx GROUP by edu_idx) d on b.edu_idx = d.edu_idx where a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND a.regist_state != '3' group by regist_idx

select b.detail_idx, b.edu_numeral, b.edu_image1, b.edu_image2, b.edu_desc, b.edu_goal, b.edu_target, b.edu_criteria, b.edu_limit_cnt, b.edu_file1, b.edu_accept_bgn_date, b.edu_accept_bgn_time, b.edu_accept_end_date, b.edu_accept_end_time, b.edu_train_bgn_date, b.edu_train_end_date, b.detail_state, po_idx, c.edu_title, c.edu_keyword, c.edu_category, d.edu_pack_count, d.module_time_sum, b.train_title, (SELECT member_nm FROM cms_member f WHERE f.member_idx = b.teacher_idx ) teacherNm, (SELECT category_nm FROM lms_edu_category f WHERE f.category_idx = c.category_idx ) eduCateNm from lms_edu_detail b left join lms_edu c on b.edu_idx = c.edu_idx left join (select edu_idx, count(1) edu_pack_count, sum(module_time) module_time_sum from lms_edu_pack aa left join lms_edu_module bb on aa.module_idx = bb.module_idx GROUP by edu_idx) d on b.edu_idx = d.edu_idx where b.delete_yn = 'n' and b.teacher_idx = #{memberIdx} AND b.detail_state = '2' AND b.edu_train_end_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
